channel.title: Russian village to blow up - Blown up, Soviet village created
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Russian village to blow up - Blown up, Soviet village created" - Russian village has been blown up and the Immortal Realm of Soviet is built upon it's ruins.

item.title: Re: Russian village to blow up
Russian village to blow up
item.content:encoded:
We're getting ready for the Impossible Mission and only need to get 25 more villagers. So if you're looking to get Survived the Impossible or just want to help, come and join - anyone that can stay active is welcome. We have all the requirements filled except for village size. When we have enough members I'll start the IM.

Requirements:

Requirements status:
I have Billy Lvl. 3 and Emosuke Lvl. 3: Yes
Leader of an Epic village: Yes
50-Ninja Village: 50/50
with 70 or more Upgrades: Yes
at least 15 of them from Monsters: Yes
I am Sannin: Yes
Have The Note: Yes
Have The Tote: Yes
Have Bankai: Yes
Have Cobra Kai: Yes
Have all three Sannin themes: Yes
Have Eye of the Storm: Yes
Have Not Wasteland Disease: Yes
Have sealed the Spirit of the Nine-Tailed Fox and/or the Spirit of the Demon of the Sand into a Theme: Yes
My Moon is Full: Yes
I am a Sannin Leader of my Epic Village: Yes
No Monsters are attacking: Portal summoned

*Update*
Russian village has been blown up and the Immortal Realm of Soviet is built upon it's ruins.
